00188 
00190 void CnipolRawHists::FillPassOne(ChannelEvent *ch)
00191 {
00192    UChar_t  chId     = ch->GetChannelId();
00193    UShort_t adcA_bin = ch->GetAmpltd() + 1;
00194    UShort_t adcI_bin = ch->GetIntgrl() + 1;
00195    UShort_t tdc_bin  = ch->GetTdc() - 10 + 1; // 10 is the lowest edge of the TvsA histograms
00196 
00197    // Speed up the filling process by getting the global bin number
00198    TH1*  hist;
00199    Int_t gbin;
00200 
00201    hist = fhTvsA_ch[chId-1];
00202    gbin = hist->GetBin(adcA_bin, tdc_bin);
00203    hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00204    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00205 
00206    hist = fhTvsI_ch[chId-1];
00207    gbin = hist->GetBin(adcI_bin, tdc_bin);
00208    hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00209    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00210 
00211    hist = fhIvsA_ch[chId-1];
00212    gbin = hist->GetBin(adcA_bin, adcI_bin);
00213    hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00214    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00215 
00216    hist = (TH1*) o["hBunchCounts"];
00217    hist->AddBinContent(ch->GetBunchId() + 1);
00218    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00219 
00220    hist = ((TH1*) o["hStripCounts"]);
00221    hist->AddBinContent(chId);
00222    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00223 
00224    hist = ((TH1*) o["hRevolutionId"]);
00225    hist->Fill(ch->GetRevolutionId());
00226 }

00228 
00230 void CnipolRawHists::FillDerivedPassOne()
00231 {
00232    Info("FillDerivedPassOne()", "Called");
00233 
00234    TH1* hAdcAmpltd = (TH1*) o["hAdcAmpltd"];
00235    TH1* hAdcIntgrl = (TH1*) o["hAdcIntgrl"];
00236    TH1* hTdc       = (TH1*) o["hTdc"];
00237    TH1* hTvsA      = (TH1*) o["hTvsA"];
00238    TH1* hTvsI      = (TH1*) o["hTvsI"];
00239    TH1* hIvsA      = (TH1*) o["hIvsA"];
00240    
00241    for (UShort_t iCh=1; iCh<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iCh++)
00242    {
00243       string sChId("  ");
00244       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iCh);
00245 
00246       DrawObjContainer *oc = d.find("channel"+sChId)->second;
00247 
00248       TH2* hTvsA_ch = (TH2*) fhTvsA_ch[iCh-1];
00249       hTvsA_ch->Sumw2();
00250       hTvsA->Add(hTvsA_ch);
00251 
00252       TH2* hTVsI_channel = (TH2*) fhTvsI_ch[iCh-1];
00253       hTvsI->Add(hTVsI_channel);
00254 
00255       TH2* hIVsA_channel = (TH2*) fhIvsA_ch[iCh-1];
00256       hIvsA->Add(hIVsA_channel);
00257 
00258       // Create projections of
00259       TH1D* hProjTmp;
00260 
00261       // AdcAmplitude, ...
00262       TH1* hAdcAmpltd_channel = (TH1*) oc->o["hAdcAmpltd_ch" + sChId];
00263       hProjTmp = hTvsA_ch->ProjectionX();
00264 
00265       utils::CopyBinContentError(hProjTmp, hAdcAmpltd_channel);
00266 
00267       hAdcAmpltd->Add(hAdcAmpltd_channel);
00268 
00269       //  ... AdcIntegral, ...
00270       TH1* hAdcIntgrl_channel = (TH1*) oc->o["hAdcIntgrl_ch" + sChId];
00271       hProjTmp = hTVsI_channel->ProjectionX();
00272 
00273       utils::CopyBinContentError(hProjTmp, hAdcIntgrl_channel);
00274 
00275       hAdcIntgrl->Add(hAdcIntgrl_channel);
00276 
00277       // ... TDC
00278       TH1* hTdc_channel = (TH1*) oc->o["hTdc_ch" + sChId];
00279       hProjTmp = hTvsA_ch->ProjectionY();
00280 
00281       utils::CopyBinContentError(hProjTmp, hTdc_channel);
00282 
00283       hTdc->Add(hTdc_channel);
00284 
00285       // Calculate cumulative histograms
00286       //utils::ConvertToCumulative2(hTvsA_ch, (TH1F*) fhTvsACumul_ch[iCh-1]);
00287 
00288       if (!gCh2WfdMap) continue;
00289 
00290       ((TH1I*) o["hWfdCounts"])->AddBinContent(gCh2WfdMap[iCh-1], hTvsA_ch->GetEntries());
00291       ((TH1I*) o["hWfdCounts"])->SetEntries(((TH1I*) o["hWfdCounts"])->GetEntries() + hTvsA_ch->GetEntries());
00292    }
00293 }
00294 
00295 
00297 void CnipolRawHists::FillDerivedPassOne(DrawObjContainer &oc)
00298 {
00299    Info("FillDerivedPassOne(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Called");
00300 
00301    // We expect empty bunch histogram container
00302    string thisDirName(fDir->GetName()); 
00303 
00304    if (thisDirName.compare("raw_neb") != 0 ||
00305         oc.d.find("raw") == oc.d.end() || oc.d.find("raw_eb") == oc.d.end() )
00306    {
00307       Error("FillDerivedPassOne(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Cannot proceed: No appropriate empty bunch container found");
00308       exit(-1);
00309       return;
00310    }
00311 
00312    CnipolRawHists* rawHists    = (CnipolRawHists*) oc.d.find("raw")->second;
00313    CnipolRawHists* rawHists_eb = (CnipolRawHists*) oc.d.find("raw_eb")->second;
00314 
00315    ChannelSetIter iCh = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00316 
00317    for (; iCh!=gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh)
00318    {
00319       UShort_t chId     = *iCh;
00320       TH1* hTvsA_ch     = (TH1F*) rawHists->GetHTvsA_ch(chId);
00321       TH1* hTvsA_ch_eb  = (TH1F*) rawHists_eb->GetHTvsA_ch(chId);
00322       TH1* hTvsA_ch_neb = (TH1F*) GetHTvsA_ch(chId);
00323 
00324       if ( !hTvsA_ch || !hTvsA_ch_eb ) {
00325          Error("FillDerivedPassOne(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Histogram %s not found", hTvsA_ch->GetName());
00326          continue;
00327       }
00328 
00329       Float_t scale = N_BUNCHES / (Float_t) gMeasInfo->GetNumEmptyBunches();
00330 
00331       //hTvsA_ch_neb->Sumw2();
00332       //hTvsA_ch_neb->Add(hTvsA_ch, hTvsA_ch_eb, 1, -1*scale);
00333 
00334       // After the subtraction set bins with negative content to 0 including under/overflows
00335       for (Int_t ibx=0; ibx<=hTvsA_ch_neb->GetNbinsX()+1; ibx++)
00336       {
00337          for (Int_t iby=0; iby<=hTvsA_ch_neb->GetNbinsY()+1; iby++)
00338          {
00339             Double_t bc     = hTvsA_ch->GetBinContent(ibx, iby);
00340             Double_t bc_eb  = hTvsA_ch_eb->GetBinContent(ibx, iby);
00341             //Double_t bc_neb = hTvsA_ch_neb->GetBinContent(ibx, iby);
00342             Int_t    bc_neb = bc - gRandom->Poisson(bc_eb*scale);
00343 
00344             bc_neb = bc_neb < 0 ? 0 : bc_neb;
00345 
00346             hTvsA_ch_neb->SetBinContent(ibx, iby, bc_neb);
00347             hTvsA_ch_neb->SetBinError(ibx, iby, TMath::Sqrt(bc_neb));
00348          }
00349       }
00350    }
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00355 TH1* CnipolRawHists::GetHTvsA_ch(UShort_t chId)
00356 {
00357    return fhTvsA_ch[chId-1];
00358 }
